name: Explosive Summit Scale
description:
Use explosive barrels to boost to the top of a mountain before running out of gas.

Need a boost? How about some conveniently placed explosive barrels! Hit the barrel and get a boost down the track.

Beware! There may be a surprise lurking at the top of the mountain.

Keyboard controls

W - Forward

S - Brake/Reverse

AD - Steer

ESC - Pause/Quit

Also supports X-box 360 gamepad.

Right trigger - Forward

Left trigger - Brake/Reverse

Left stick - Steer

Start - Pause/Quit
